src:
Разговор про историю либертарианского движения в США
04 Nov 2019, 09:30 by Pelifoss



GETTING LIBERTARIANISM RIGHT | Hans–Hermann Hoppe4Conversation with dr. Hans-Hermann Hoppe about corrupting money in politics, perils of democracy, split between Cato Institute and Rothbard, freedom of associa…www.youtube.com
Разговор с доктором Гансом–Германом Хоппе про историю либертарианского движения в США, раскол между институтом Мизеса и Катона, свободу ассоциации, коррупцию идеалов и демократическое проклятье.Беседа на английском, но есть качественные русские субтитры.
text:
A talk about the history of the libertarian movement in the USA
04 Nov 2019, 09:30 by Pelifoss



GETTING LIBERTARIANISM RIGHT | Hans – Hermann Hoppe4Conversation with dr. Hans-Hermann Hoppe about corrupting money in politics, perils of democracy, split between Cato Institute and Rothbard, freedom of associa ... www.youtube.com
Conversation with Dr. Hans-Hermann Hoppe about the history of the libertarian movement in the USA, the split between the Mises and Cato Institute, freedom of association, ideals corruption and a democratic curse. Conversation in English, but there are high-quality Russian subtitles.
